如是我聞：: 一時，佛在毘耶離菴羅樹園，與大比丘眾八千人俱，
This is what I heard:: At one time the Buddha was in the Amra Gardens in the city of Vaishali, accompanied by a multitude of leading monks num bering eight thousand.

如是我聞：: 菩薩三萬二千——眾所知識，大智本行，皆悉成就；
This is what I heard:: There were also thirty-two thousand bodhisattvas, all known to the assembly, persons who had carried out all the basic practices of great wisdom.

如是我聞：: 諸佛威神之所建立，為護法城，受持正法；
This is what I heard:: Sustained by the might and supernatural powers of the Buddhas, they accepted and upheld the correct Law in order to guard the citadel of the Dharma.

如是我聞：: 能師子吼，名聞十方；
This is what I heard:: They knew how to roar the lion's roar, and their fame resounded irt the ten directions.

如是我聞：: 眾人不請，友而安之；
This is what I heard:: Without waiting to be asked, they befriended others and brought them comfort.

如是我聞：: 紹隆三寶，能使不絕；
This is what I heard:: They ensured the continuance and prosperity of the Three Treasures, making certain that these never expired.

如是我聞：: 降伏魔怨，制諸外道，
This is what I heard:: They conquered and subdued the ill will of the devils and curbed the non-Buddhist doctrines.

如是我聞：: 悉已清淨，永離蓋纏；心常安住，無礙解脫；
This is what I heard:: All were spotless and pure, having long ago rid themselves of snares and obstructions; their minds constantly resided in a state of unhindered emancipation.

如是我聞：: 念、定、總持、辯才不斷；布施、持戒、忍辱、精進、禪定、智慧及方便、力，無不具足；
This is what I heard:: Their mindfulness, meditation, retention of the teachings, and eloquence never faltered, and of almsgiving, keeping of the precepts, forbearance, assiduousness, meditation, wisdom, and the power to employ expedient means, there was not one they were deficient in.

如是我聞：: 逮無所得不起法忍；
This is what I heard:: They had learned to accept the fact that there is nothing to be grasped at, no view of phenomena to be entertained.

如是我聞：: 已能隨順，轉不退輪；
This is what I heard:: They knew how to respond compliantly to others and to turn the unregressing wheel of the Law.

如是我聞：: 善解法相，知眾生根；蓋諸大眾得無所畏、
This is what I heard:: Expert in comprehending the characteristics of phenomena, able to understand the capacities of living beings, they towered over the others of the great assembly and had learned to be fearful of nothing.

如是我聞：: 功德智慧，以修其心；相好嚴身，色像第一，捨諸世間所有飾好；
This is what I heard:: With their merits and wisdom they disciplined their minds; they adorned their bodies with auspicious signs, ranking foremost in aspect and form, but rejected all worldly embellishments.

如是我聞：: 名稱高遠，踰於須彌；深信堅固，猶若金剛；
This is what I heard:: In fame and renown they soared higher than Mount Sumeru; their profound faith was diamondlike in its firmness.

如是我聞：: 法寶普照，而雨甘露；於眾言音，微妙第一；
This is what I heard:: The jewels of their Dharma shone everywhere, raining down sweet dew, and among the assembly the sound of their words was the most subtle and wonderful of all.

如是我聞：: 深入緣起，斷諸邪見，有無二邊，無復餘習；
This is what I heard:: They had plumbed the depths of dependent origination and cut off all erroneous views, no longer entertaining the concepts either of being or nonbeing.

如是我聞：: 演法無畏，猶師子吼，其所講說，乃如雷震，
This is what I heard:: In expounding the Law they were fearless as roaring lions, and their disquisitions on it rolled forth like thunder.

如是我聞：: 無有量，已過量；
This is what I heard:: There was no measuring them, for they had passed beyond measure.

如是我聞：: 集眾法寶，如海導師，
This is what I heard:: In seeking out the jewels of the Dharma, they were like practiced pilots at sea.

如是我聞：: 了達諸法深妙之義；善知眾生往來所趣及心所行；
This is what I heard:: They had mastered all the profound and subtle meanings of the doctrines and were expert in perceiving the past and future existences of living beings and the workings of their minds.

如是我聞：: 近無等等佛自在慧、十力、無畏、十八不共；
This is what I heard:: They came close to equaling the freely exercised wisdom of the Buddha, the unparalleled one, his ten powers, his fearlessness, and his eighteen unshared properties.

如是我聞：: 關閉一切諸惡趣門，而生五道以現其身；為大醫王，善療眾病，應病與藥，令得服行；
This is what I heard:: Though they had firmly closed the gate to all manner of evil existences, yet they allowed themselves to be born in the five lower realms, manifesting themselves there so that they might act as great physician kings, adroitly healing the ills of others, doling out whatever medicine suited the ailment, and insuring that the patient took it as prescribed.

如是我聞：: 無量功德皆成就，無量佛土皆嚴淨；
This is what I heard:: Countless benefits— all these they had acquired; countless Buddha lands — all these they had made marvelously pure.

如是我聞：: 其見聞者，無不蒙益，諸有所作，亦不唐捐：
This is what I heard:: No one saw or listened to them without profiting thereby, and no action of theirs was ever performed in vain.

如是我聞：: 如是一切功德，皆悉具足——
This is what I heard:: Such was the manner in which all merits adhered to them.

如是我聞：: 其名曰：等觀菩薩、不等觀菩薩、等不等觀菩薩、定自在王菩薩、法自在王菩薩、法相菩薩、光相菩薩、光嚴菩薩、大嚴菩薩、寶積菩薩、辯積菩薩、寶手菩薩、寶印手菩薩、常舉手菩薩、常下手菩薩、常慘菩薩、喜根菩薩、喜王菩薩、辯音菩薩、虛空藏菩薩、執寶炬菩薩、寶勇菩薩、寶見菩薩、帝網菩薩、明網菩薩、無緣觀菩薩、慧積菩薩、寶勝菩薩、天王菩薩、壞魔菩薩、電德菩薩、自在王菩薩、功德相嚴菩薩、師子吼菩薩、雷音菩薩、山相擊音菩薩、香象菩薩、白香象菩薩、常精進菩薩、不休息菩薩、妙生菩薩、華嚴菩薩、觀世音菩薩、得大勢菩薩、梵網菩薩、寶杖菩薩、無勝菩薩、嚴土菩薩、金髻菩薩、珠髻菩薩、彌勒菩薩、文殊師利法王子菩薩，
This is what I heard:: The names of the bodhisattvas were Bodhisattva Viewing Equality, Bodhisattva Viewing Inequality, Bodhisattva Viewing Equality and Inequality, Bodhisattva Meditation Freedom King, Bodhisattva Dharma Freedom King, Bodhisattva Dharma Forms, Bodhisattva Shining Forms, Bodhisattva Shining Adornment, Bodhisattva Great Adornment, Bodhisattva Jeweled Accumulation, Bodhisattva Accumulation of Eloquence, Bodhisattva Jeweled Hand, Bodhisattva Jeweled Seal Hand, Bodhisattva Constantly Raised Hand, Bodhisattva Constantly Extended Hand, Bodhisattva Constantly Commiserating, Bodhisattva Joyful Capacity, Bodhisattva Joyful King, Bodhisattva Eloquent Sound, Bodhisattva Storehouse of Emptiness, Bodhisattva Holder of the Jeweled Torch, Bodhisattva Jeweled Valor, Bodhisattva Jeweled View, Bodhisattva of Indra's Net, Bodhisattva Bright Net, Bodhisattva Unconditioned View, Bodhisattva Wisdom Accumulation, Bodhisattva Jeweled Supremacy, Bodhisattva Heavenly King, Bodhisattva Devil Defeating, Bodhisattva Lightning Virtue, Bodhisattva Freedom King, Bodhisattva Merit Forms and Adornments, Bodhisattva Lion's Roar, Bodhisattva Thunder Sound, Bodhisattva Mountain Form Smiting Sound, Bodhisattva Rutting Elephant, Bodhisattva White Rutting Elephant, Bodhisattva Constant Exertion, Bodhisattva Never Resting, Bodhisattva Wonderful Birth, Bodhisattva Flower Adornment, Bodhisattva Perceiver of the World's Sounds, Bodhisattva Gainer of Great Authority, Bodhisattva of Brahma's Net, Bodhisattva Jeweled Staff, Bodhisattva Unsurpassed, Bodhisattva Adorned Land, Bodhisattva Golden Locks, Bodhisattva Gemmed Locks, Bodhisattva Maitreya, and Bodhisattva Dharma Prince Manjushri.

如是我聞：: 如是等三萬二千人。
This is what I heard:: There were thirty-two thousand bodhisattvas such as these.

如是我聞：: 復有萬梵天王尸棄等，從餘四天下來詣佛所而聽法；
This is what I heard:: There were also ten thousand Brahma kings, Shikhin and others, who had come from the other four-continent worlds to visit the place where the Buddha was and listen to the Dharma.

如是我聞：: 復有萬二千天帝，亦從餘四天下來在會坐；
This is what I heard:: There were also twelve thousand Indras who had come from the other four-continent worlds to take a seat in the gathering.

如是我聞：: 并餘大威力諸天、龍神、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿脩羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽等，悉來會坐；
This is what I heard:: In addition, there were other heavenly beings of great authority and power, as well as dragons, spirits, yakshas, gandharvas, asuras, garudas, kimnaras, mahoragas, and others, all come to take a seat in the assembly.

如是我聞：: 諸比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，俱來會坐。
This is what I heard:: Also arrived to take seats in the assembly were the various monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen.

如是我聞：: 彼時佛與無量百千之眾，恭敬圍繞而為說法，
This is what I heard:: At that time the Buddha, reverently surrounded by this multitude of countless hundreds and thousands of beings, expounded the Law for them.

如是我聞：: 譬如須彌山王顯于大海，
This is what I heard:: He was like Mount Sumeru, king of mountains, rising up out of the great sea.

如是我聞：: 安處眾寶師子之座，蔽於一切諸來大眾。
This is what I heard:: Resting at ease in his lion's seat clustered with jewels, he shed his radiance over all the great throng gathered there.

如是我聞：: 爾時毘耶離城有長者子，名曰寶積，與五百長者子，俱持七寶蓋來詣佛所，
This is what I heard:: At that time a man named Jeweled Accumulation, son of a wealthy man of the city of Vaishali, along with five hundred other sons of wealthy men, had come to the place where the Buddha was, all of them bearing parasols adorned with the seven treasures.

如是我聞：: 頭面禮足，各以其蓋共供養佛。
This is what I heard:: Bowing their heads in obeisance before the feet of the Buddha, they joined in offering their parasols as alms to the Buddha.

如是我聞：: 佛之威神，令諸寶蓋合成一蓋，遍覆三千大千世界，
This is what I heard:: The Buddha with his supernatural powers then caused all the jeweled parasols to come together and form one single parasol that spread over the entire thousand-millionfold world.

如是我聞：: 而此世界廣長之相悉於中現；
This is what I heard:: All the vast features of that world were visible there in its midst.

如是我聞：: 又此三千大千世界諸須彌山、雪山、目真隣陀山、摩訶目真隣陀山、香山、寶山、金山、黑山、鐵圍山、大鐵圍山，大海江河，川流泉源及日月星辰、天宮、龍宮、諸尊神宮，悉現於寶蓋中；
This is what I heard:: All the Mount Sumerus of the thousand-millionfold world, Snow Mountains, Muchilinda Mountains, Mahamuchilinda Mountains, Fragrant Mountains, Jeweled Mountains, Gold Mountains, Black Mountains, Iron Encircling Mountains, Great Iron Encircling Mountains, the huge seas, the rivers and watercourses, brooks and streams, fountains and springs, as well as the suns, moons, stars, constellations, heavenly palaces, dragon palaces, and the palaces of the venerable spirits— all these were to be seen within the jeweled parasol.

如是我聞：: 又十方諸佛、諸佛說法，亦現於寶蓋中。
This is what I heard:: And the Buddhas of the ten directions, the Buddhas as they preached the Law— these too were visible within the jeweled parasol.

如是我聞：: 爾時一切大眾，覩佛神力，歎未曾有！
This is what I heard:: At that time all the members of the great assembly, witnessing this manifestation of the Buddha's supernatural powers, sighed in admiration at what they had never seen before.

如是我聞：: 合掌禮佛，瞻仰尊顏，目不暫捨。
This is what I heard:: Pressing their palms together, they made obeisance to the Buddha, gazing up in reverence at the face of the Honored One and never taking their eyes from it.

如是我聞：: 於是長者子寶積即於佛前，以偈頌曰：
This is what I heard:: Then the rich man's son, Jeweled Accumulation, in the presence of the Buddha recited these verses of praise:

如是我聞：: 「目淨脩廣如青蓮，­心淨已度諸禪定，久積淨業稱無量，導眾以寂故稽首。
This is what I heard:: Eyes pure and broad like the blue lotus; mind pure, steeped in meditations; for pure deeds long accumulated, boundless in fame,your quietude guides the assembly— thus we bow our heads.

如是我聞：: 既見大聖以神變，普現十方無量土，其中諸佛演說法，於是一切悉見聞。
This is what I heard:: We have seen the great sage work miraculous transformations, showing us all the countless lands in ten directions,the Buddhas expounding the Law therein— every one of these we have seen and heard.

如是我聞：: 法王法力超群生，常以法財施一切，
This is what I heard:: The Dharma King's Dharma powers surpass all other beings, constantly he bestows Dharma riches on them all.

如是我聞：: 能善分別諸法相，於第一義而不動，
This is what I heard:: Skillfully he distinguishes the characteristics of phenomena, never faltering in his grasp of the one great Truth.

如是我聞：: 已於諸法得自在，是故稽首此法王。
This is what I heard:: You have learned to treat all phenomena with freedom,so we bow our heads to this Dharma King.

如是我聞：: 說法不有亦不無，以因緣故諸法生，
This is what I heard:: You define things as neither existing nor not existing; causes and conditions bring about their birth.

如是我聞：: 無我無造無受者，善惡之業亦不亡。
This is what I heard:: No I, no doer, no recipient, yet good and bad karma never cease to function.

如是我聞：: 始在佛樹力降魔，得甘露滅覺道成，
This is what I heard:: Beneath the Buddha tree, you used your might to overpower the devil; gaining the sweet dew of nirvana, you won your way to enlightenment.

如是我聞：: 已無心意無受行，而悉摧伏諸外道。
This is what I heard:: Already free of thought, perception, and volition,you refuted all the non-Buddhist doctrines.

如是我聞：: 三轉法輪於大千，其輪本來常清淨，
This is what I heard:: Three times you turned the wheel of the Law in the thousand-millionfold world, the wheel that from the first has always been pure.

如是我聞：: 天人得道此為證，三寶於是現世間。
This is what I heard:: Heavenly and human beings gained the way— this was proof of it; the Three Treasures thereupon appeared in the world.

如是我聞：: 以斯妙法濟群生，一受不退常寂然，
This is what I heard:: This wonderful Law brought rescue to the many beings; embracing it, they never regress but dwell in constant quietude.

如是我聞：: 度老病死大醫王，當禮法海德無邊。
This is what I heard:: Great physician king, healer of old age, sickness and death, we pay homage to the boundless virtue of your Dharma sea;

如是我聞：: 毀譽不動如須彌，於善不善等以慈，
This is what I heard:: unmoved by acclamation or abuse, like Mount Sumeru, you pity in equal measure the good and the not good.

如是我聞：: 心行平等如虛空，孰聞人寶不敬承？
This is what I heard:: In mind and action impartial, like the empty sky—who can hark to this jewel of humankind, not give respectful assent?

如是我聞：: 今奉世尊此微蓋，於中現我三千界，
This is what I heard:: Now we offer these little parasols to the World-Honored One, and in them is revealed to us the three thousand worlds.

如是我聞：: 諸天龍神所居宮，乾闥婆等及夜叉。悉見世間諸所有，十力哀現是化變，
This is what I heard:: Palaces where gods, dragons, and spirits reside,kimnaras, yakshas, and all those other beings, everything that exists in the world we see— the ten-powered one in pity manifests these transformations.

如是我聞：: 眾覩希有皆歎佛，今我稽首三界尊。
This is what I heard:: The assembly, seeing this rare sight, all praise the Buddha; now we bow our heads to the venerable one of the threefold world.

如是我聞：: 大聖法王眾所歸，淨心觀佛靡不欣，
This is what I heard:: Great sage, Dharma King, refuge of the multitude—viewing the Buddha with purified mind, none who do not rejoice!

如是我聞：: 各見世尊在其前，斯則神力不共法；
This is what I heard:: Each sees the World-Honored One standing right before him— such are the Buddha's transcendental powers, his unshared properties.

如是我聞：: 佛以一音演說法，眾生隨類各得解，
This is what I heard:: The Buddha preaches the Law with a single voice, but each living being understands it according to his kind.

如是我聞：: 皆謂世尊同其語，斯則神力不共法；
This is what I heard:: All believe the World-Honored One speaks the same words to all— such are his transcendental powers, his unshared properties.

如是我聞：: 佛以一音演說法，眾生各各隨所解，
This is what I heard:: The Buddha preaches the Law with a single voice,but each living being understands it in his own way.

如是我聞：: 普得受行獲其利，斯則神力不共法；
This is what I heard:: All undertake the Buddha's practices and gain profit thereby— such are his transcendental powers, his unshared properties.

如是我聞：: 佛以一音演說法，或有恐畏或歡喜，
This is what I heard:: The Buddha preaches the Law with a single voice, but to some it brings fear, to others delight and joy.

如是我聞：: 或生厭離或斷疑，斯則神力不共法。
This is what I heard:: Some are moved to leave the world, some are freed of doubt— such are his transcendental powers, his unshared properties.

如是我聞：: 稽首十力大精進，稽首已得無所畏，
This is what I heard:: Before the great diligence of the ten-powered one we bow our heads; we bow our heads to the fearlessness he has attained.

如是我聞：: 稽首住於不共法，稽首一切大導師，
This is what I heard:: We bow heads before the one who dwells in unshared properties, bow heads before the great leader of all beings.

如是我聞：: 稽首能斷眾結縛，稽首已到於彼岸，
This is what I heard:: You can cut the thongs that bind the multitude—we bow heads to that; you crossed to the other shore—we bow heads to that.

如是我聞：: 稽首能度諸世間，稽首永離生死道。
This is what I heard:: We bow heads to one who can save all those in this world, bow heads to one who long ago left the path of birth and death.

如是我聞：: 悉知眾生來去相，善於諸法得解脫，
This is what I heard:: You know the marks of all beings in their comings and goings, you have gained apt liberation from all phenomena.

如是我聞：: 不著世間如蓮華，常善入於空寂行，達諸法相無罣礙，稽首如空無所依。
This is what I heard:: Free of worldly attachments, like the lotus blossom,constantly you move within the realm of emptiness and quiet; you have mastered the marks of all phenomena, no blocks or hindrances; like the sky, you lean on nothing— we bow our heads!

如是我聞：: 爾時長者子寶積說此偈已，白佛言：
This is what I heard:: When the rich man's son, Jeweled Accumulation, had finished reciting these verses, he addressed the Buddha, saying,

如是我聞：: 「世尊！是五百長者子，皆已發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，
This is what I heard:: World-Honored One, these five hundred sons of rich men have all set their minds on anuttara-samyak-sambodhi.

如是我聞：: 願聞得佛國土清淨，
This is what I heard:: They wish to hear how one can purify the Buddha lands.

如是我聞：: 唯願世尊說諸菩薩淨土之行！」
This is what I heard:: We beg the World-Honored One to explain the practices carried out by bodhisattvas in purifying the lands.

如是我聞：: 佛言：
This is what I heard:: The Buddha said,

如是我聞：: 「善哉！寶積！
This is what I heard:: Excellent, Jeweled Accumulation!

如是我聞：: 乃能為諸菩薩，問於如來淨土之行。
This is what I heard:: For the sake of the bodhisattvas you do right to ask the Thus Come One about the practices for purifying the lands.

如是我聞：: 諦聽，諦聽！
This is what I heard:: Listen well, listen well,

如是我聞：: 善思念之，當為汝說！」
This is what I heard:: and mull it over in your thoughts! I will now explain to you.

如是我聞：: 於是寶積及五百長者子受教而聽。
This is what I heard:: Jeweled Accumulation and the other five hundred sons of rich men then made ready to listen to the teachings addressed to them.

如是我聞：: 佛言：「寶積！眾生之類是菩薩佛土。
This is what I heard:: The Buddha said, Jeweled Accumulation, the various kinds of living beings are in themselves the Buddha lands of the bodhisattvas.

如是我聞：: 所以者何？菩薩隨所化眾生而取佛土，
This is what I heard:: Why so? Because it is by converting various beings to the teachings that the bodhisattvas acquire their Buddha lands.

如是我聞：: 隨所調伏眾生而取佛土，
This is what I heard:: It is by persuading various beings and overcoming their objections that the bodhisattvas acquire their Buddha lands.

如是我聞：: 隨諸眾生應以何國入佛智慧而取佛土，
This is what I heard:: It is by inducing the various living beings to enter into the Buddha wisdom in such-and-such a land that they acquire their Buddha lands.

如是我聞：: 隨諸眾生應以何國起菩薩根而取佛土。
This is what I heard:: It is by inducing the various living beings to develop the capacity for bodhisattva practices in such-and-such a land that they acquire their Buddha lands.

如是我聞：: 所以者何？
This is what I heard:: Why is this?

如是我聞：: 菩薩取於淨國，皆為饒益諸眾生故。
This is what I heard:: Because the bodhisattva's acquisition of a pure land is wholly due to his having brought benefit to living beings.

如是我聞：: 譬如有人，欲於空地造立宮室，
This is what I heard:: Suppose a man proposes to build a mansion on a plot of open land.

如是我聞：: 隨意無礙；
This is what I heard:: He may do so as he wishes without hindrance.

如是我聞：: 若於虛空，終不能成！
This is what I heard:: But if he tries to build it in the empty air, he will never be successful.

如是我聞：: 菩薩如是，
This is what I heard:: It is the same with the bodhisattvas.

如是我聞：: 為成就眾生故，願取佛國，
This is what I heard:: It is because they wish to help others to achieve success that they take their vow to acquire Buddha lands.
